name: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou Vol. 1: Bremen no Ongakutai
overview: Grimm Meisaku Gekijou: Bremen no Ongakutai is a game, developed and published by Ima Company, which was released in Japan in 1994. The game relies heavily on the then new full motion video feature of the 3DO. The game is a compilation of cartoon, all of which follows loosely upon stories made famous by the Brothers Grimm. The  animation for the cartoons was done by the famous Nippon Anime  Corporation. They made multiple of these cartoon series, this is the first one produced.
